nodes.text: Sector Police Subpost 186 was a Coruscant Police station located on the planet Coruscant. It was heavily fortified, windowless, and contained office space and holding cells. In 19 BBY, the Sullustan journalist Den Dhur was briefly held at Subpost 186 after he was arrested for impersonating a police officer. Former Jedi and private investigator Jax Pavan went to the station to fill out the paperwork necessary to have Dhur released.
Sector Police Subpost 186 first appeared in Coruscant Nights II: Street of Shadows, which was published on August 26, 2008 and written by Michael Reaves.
